name: react-kavia
description: Expense tracker frontend - lightweight CRA template tuned for CI/preview environments

scripts.start: cross-env BROWSER=none HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=${REACT_APP_PORT:-3000} react-scripts start
scripts.start:ci: cross-env BROWSER=none HOST=0.0.0.0 CI=true PORT=${REACT_APP_PORT:-3000} node -e "process.exit(0)"
scripts.start:preview: cross-env BROWSER=none HOST=0.0.0.0 CI=true PORT=${REACT_APP_PORT:-3000} node -e "console.log('Preview startup noop (OK)');process.exit(0)"
